statements: DELETE FROM customer_contacts WHERE customer_id = 123 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM communication_preferences WHERE customer_id = 456 AND push_notifications = true;
DELETE FROM CustomerContacts WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CommunicationPreferences WHERE email_subscription = TRUE)
DELETE FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CommunicationPreferences WHERE customer_id = 100 AND sms_opt_in = true;
DELETE FROM OrderHistory WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_amount > 500.00;
